text: id | date_iso | title | summary | category | source | url id: evt-2025-08-07-msft-gpt5-copilot | date_iso: 2025-08-07 | title: Microsoft integrates GPT-5 into Copilot and Azure | summary: Microsoft began integrating GPT-5 into Microsoft 365 Copilot, Copilot Studio and Azure AI, adding tenant isolation, hybrid options, audit logs and RBAC. The upgrades support multi-document reasoning, coding assistance and workflow automation. Developer tooling focuses on building composite chains with SLA monitoring for enterprise deployments. | category: AI / Cloud | source: Microsoft Blog | url: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/blog/2025/08/07/available-today-gpt-5-in-microsoft-365-copilot/
